channel.title: ~ FryScape - Universial Server Compiler ~
channel.description:
[size=18pt][b]FryScape v1.0 BETA[/b][/size]
FryScape is a free, open-source project I've been working on, and have decided to release an older beta version of it (I'm currently updating it for compatability with 317, 508, 525, and etc...). It is an all-in-one compiler, very much similar to the other compilers, except for it's hidden library that helps it compile the different types of "oldie" servers (such as Czar, Delta, Dev, and many others).
Feel free to contribute to FryScape! I will be posting pictures very soon, just wanted to get this on here ASAP. Good luck!
[b]UPDATES:[/b]
10/7/09 - V1.0 - Released FryScape under beta 10/8/09 - V1.1 - Cleaned up FryScape, added screenshots, some other minor changes
[b]V1.0[/b] Download Link (Uppit): *DELETED*
[b]V1.1[/b] Download Link (Uppit): *DELETED*
[color=red][b]NEWEST - FRYSCAPE APPLICATION + SOURCE[/b][/color] [b] V1.2[/b] Download Link (No Source): http://uppit.com/v/RZGUB4NG
Download Link (With Source): http://uppit.com/v/bap806w2
[color=red][b]***Source code is in C++, and is self explanatory as well as outlined***[/b][/color]
[b] OLD PICTURES[/b]
[IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/ilya12.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/34ql7ux.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/f257ag.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/2jdqbty.jpg[/img]
[b]NEW PICTURES ARE COMING SOON![/b]

item.title: ~ FryScape - Universial Server Compiler ~
item.dc:creator: @fatwallet fatwallet
item.description:
@fatwallet wrote:

This contains a multitude of applications, each geared for an individual server-type-compilation. There are about 8 folders, each containing a server type, e.g: 508, 125, 317. I have included the ‘main.cpp’ C++ source file, which if you download the compiler for, you can compile and execute it yourself, if you’re unsure.

Read full topic

item.title: ~ FryScape - Universial Server Compiler ~
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

Rule #6

6) No *.bat / list files PERIOD! There are stupid and a waste of time to bother with. Learn to program with a real language. If you're beatiful server includes one of these in the topic itself [b](if its included in the download its okay)[/b] then it'll be locked and you'll be punished. Forgot to mention, they only work on Windows, too. Also lists aren't really a download as it is usually a text file with some scribbles in it. The official Moparscape client already has a list. USE IT!

Read full topic

FryScape is a free, open-source project I’ve been working on, and have decided to release an older beta version of it (I’m currently updating it for compatability with 317, 508, 525, and etc…).
